trans-unit.source: Represents the configuration elements associated with a provider.
trans-unit.target: 表示与提供程序关联的配置元素。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET uses providers to perform specific services required by a feature.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 使用提供程序执行所需的一项功能的特定服务。

trans-unit.source: For example, the membership feature uses a provider to coordinate the persistence of membership data in a database.
trans-unit.target: 例如，成员资格功能使用提供程序来协调的数据库中的成员身份数据持久性。

trans-unit.source: In a configuration file, individual providers are added to a `providers` element within a particular feature section.
trans-unit.target: 在配置文件中，单个提供程序添加到`providers`特定功能部分中的元素。

trans-unit.source: The ProviderSettings class represents a particular group of settings that are added to the `providers` element within a configuration section.
trans-unit.target: ProviderSettings 类表示一组特定的设置添加到`providers`一个配置节内的元素。

trans-unit.source: Typically the configuration attributes specified by the `add` directive include a name, type, and other properties.
trans-unit.target: 将配置属性通常由指定`add`指令包括名称、 类型和其他属性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ProviderSettings"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Configuration.ProviderSettings"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings>类</xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings>的新实例

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a new <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings> instance.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数创建一个新<xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings>实例。</xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ProviderSettings"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Configuration.ProviderSettings"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a new <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings> instance with the specified name and type.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数创建一个新<xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings>具有指定的名称和类型的实例。</xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings>

trans-unit.source: The name of the provider to configure settings for.
trans-unit.target: 要为配置设置的提供程序名称。

trans-unit.source: The type of the provider to configure settings for.
trans-unit.target: 要为配置设置的提供程序类型。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the provider configured by this class.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此类配置的提供程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: This value of the Name property is the same as the value for the `name` attribute that appears in the configuration section for the provider that is configured by the <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings> class.
trans-unit.target: 名称属性的这个值是相同的值`name`的提供程序配置的<xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings>类</xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings>，将显示在配置部分的属性

trans-unit.source: The name of the provider.
trans-unit.target: 提供程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of user-defined parameters for the provider.
trans-unit.target: 获取提供程序的用户定义的参数集合。

trans-unit.source: Use the Parameters property to access the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection> parameters for this <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings> object.
trans-unit.target: 参数属性用于访问<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection>此参数<xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings>对象。</xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref> of parameters for the provider.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"> </xref>的提供程序的参数。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of the provider configured by this class.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此类配置的提供程序的类型。

trans-unit.source: The Type property contains the fully qualified namespace and class name for the provider configured by the <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings> class.
trans-unit.target: 类型属性包含配置<xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings>类</xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings>的提供程序的完全限定命名空间和类名称

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified namespace and class name for the type of provider configured by this <xref href="System.Configuration.ProviderSettings"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 此配置提供程序的类型的完全限定命名空间和类名称<xref href="System.Configuration.ProviderSettings"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
